meanings.definition: A group of people who operate and maintain an aircraft.
meanings.sent1: The aircrews prepared the plane for takeoff.
meanings.sent2: The aircrews worked together to ensure the safety of the flight.
meanings.sent3: The aircrews joked about who would get to sit in the pilot's seat.
meanings.sent4: The aircrews were the heroes of the sky, guiding the metal bird through the clouds.
meanings.sent5: The aircrews' dedication to their craft was evident in every flight.

meanings.definition: The personnel who work together as a team on an aircraft.
meanings.sent1: During the flight, the aircrews communicated effectively to coordinate their tasks.
meanings.sent2: The aircrews' teamwork was crucial for the success of the mission.
meanings.sent3: The aircrews celebrated a successful landing with high-fives all around.
meanings.sent4: In the vast sky, the aircrews were a synchronized dance of expertise and trust.
meanings.sent5: The aircrews' unity was like a well-oiled machine in the sky.
